about.title: About Guangdong Remon Hardware Industrial Co., Ltd.
about.content1: Founded in 1986, Guangdong Remon Hardware Industrial Co., Ltd. is a professional enterprise specializing in the R&D, production, and sales of furniture hardware accessories. Since its establishment, the company has always adhered to the concept of 'Quality First, Innovation Development', committed to providing high-quality products and excellent service to customers.
about.content2: We have advanced production equipment and professional technical team, with products covering multiple series including slides and hinges. Through continuous technological innovation and process improvement, our products have won good reputation in the market.
about.content3: The company focuses on product quality management and has established a complete quality control system. We look forward to establishing long-term cooperation relationships with you, developing together and creating the future.
